More Wishes.name: More Wishes
More Wishes.desc: Your wish is my command... wait stop no you can't just wish for more wishes!!

Another Try.name: Another Try
Another Try.desc: That sounds like a fair request, what exactly would you like another try at? @

1000000 Opals.name: 1000000 Opals
1000000 Opals.desc: A million opals??!? M'lord please, lets be reasonable here! I can give to you but one opal...

Bring Them Back.name: Bring Them Back
Bring Them Back.desc: I'm sorry, I can't do this... it wouldn't be right. @ But I can grant 12 hours of respect, to whom should it go? @

World 4 Stuff.name: World 4 Stuff
World 4 Stuff.desc: Uhh, sure, how about these bonuses: @ +{% Cooking Speed @ +% Shiny Pet LV Up & Breedability Rate @ +~% Lab EXP gain

A Moderate Discount.name: A Moderate Discount
A Moderate Discount.desc: A... discount? Just a discount? Thats uh, yea, that is certainly doable m'lord. @ I can grant an additional 15% discount on the next Engineer Schematic creation!

World 5 Things.name: World 5 Things
World 5 Things.desc: Wow very specific! How about: @ +{% Sailing Loot Value @ +% Bits gain @ +~% Divinity Pts gain

Infinite Resources.name: Infinite Resources
Infinite Resources.desc: Infinite isn't a number, it's more of a concept... and conceptually my existence is impossible. @ Instead, I'll grant a #x bonus to Well and Harp resource gain!

World 6 Majigers.name: World 6 Majigers
World 6 Majigers.desc: Yes yes majigers, how about things like: @ +{% Next Crop chance @ +% Stealth for Ninja twins @ +~% All Essence gain

Knowledge of Future.name: Knowledge of Future
Knowledge of Future.desc: If I told you what the future was, it wouldn't really be the future anymore would it m'lord? No, you'll have to wait for the future to be the now.

World 7 Stuff.name: World 7 Stuff
World 7 Stuff.desc: Bah, you should start with wishing for World 7 in the first place! We both know it doesn't exist yet!

World 8 Stuff.name: World 8 Stuff
World 8 Stuff.desc: Oh please, World 8? Is this 'World 8' in the room with us right now? M'lord, you waste both our time!
